17 int main(int argc, char** argv){
18  ros::init(argc, argv, "grp_controller");
19  ros::NodeHandle n;
20 
21  ros::Subscriber goal_sub = n.subscribe("/grp_navi/plan",1,callback_goal);
22  ros::Subscriber odom_sub = n.subscribe("/RosAria/odom", 1, callback_state);
23  ros::Publisher cmd_vel_pub = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/RosAria/cmd_vel", 1);
24 
25  purePursuit pure_pursuit;
26  while(ros::ok())
27  {
28  if(goal.rows() != 0){
29  control pp_control = pure_pursuit.get_control(robot_pose, goal);
30  setcmdvel(pp_control.v, pp_control.w);
31  cmd_vel_pub.publish(cmd_vel);
32  }
33 
34  ros::spinOnce();
35  ros::Rate(100).sleep();
36  }
37  return 0;
38 }
39 
40 void callback_state(const nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr& odom_msgs){
41  robot_pose(0) = odom_msgs->pose.pose.position.x;
42  robot_pose(1) = odom_msgs->pose.pose.position.y;
43  robot_pose(2) = tf::getYaw(odom_msgs->pose.pose.orientation);
44 
45 }
46 
47 void callback_goal(const geometry_msgs::PointConstPtr& goal_msgs){
48  goal(0) = goal_msgs->x;
49  goal(1) = goal_msgs->y;
50 }
51 
52 void setcmdvel(double v, double w){
53  cmd_vel.linear.x = v;
54  cmd_vel.linear.y = 0.0;
55  cmd_vel.linear.z = 0.0;
56  cmd_vel.angular.x = 0.0;
57  cmd_vel.angular.y = 0.0;
58  cmd_vel.angular.z = w;
59 }
